text.title: Over 900 asylum seekers rescued off Indonesian coast
text.head: Over 900 asylum seekers rescued off Indonesian coast
Sources

list.item: Nurdin Hasan (AFP ). "'As we were swimming, we cried for help': Over 900 migrants rescued as pressure grows over South-East Asia crisis" — The Age , May 16, 2015
"Indonesian navy rescues 200 from ocean near Aceh, after 750 saved earlier" — The Guardian , May 15, 2015
George Roberts. "Indonesia's navy rescues 200 more asylum seekers from waters of Aceh" — ABC News (Australia) , May 15, 2015
AFP /Reuters. "At least 750 migrants rescued off Indonesia by local fishermen after boat sinks, police say" — ABC News (Australia) , May 15, 2015
